hackathon-description-text: The Rutgers Mobile App Development Club, Rutgers Makerspace, is hosting a Mobile/IoT Hackathon on Saturday April 15, running from 12PM - 10PM at the Cook Student Center. The hackathon is open to all Rutgers students.

hackathon-description-header: The Rutgers Mobile App Development Club, Rutgers Makerspace, and IEEE, are hosting a Mobile/IoT Hackathon
